pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transition Network Analysis (TNA) // Provides tools for performing Transition Network Analysis (TNA) to study relational dynamics, including functions for building and plotting TNA models, calculating centrality measures, and identifying dominant events and patterns. TNA statistical techniques (e.g., bootstrapping and permutation tests) ensure the reliability of observed insights and confirm that identified dynamics are meaningful. See (Saqr et al., 2025) doi:10.1145/3706468.3706513 for more details on TNA.
